title: House for Sale in Negombo
details:
Address of property to be sold: Sri Wickrama Rajasinghe Road, Negombo
Number of bedrooms: 4 rooms
Number of bathrooms: 3
Floor area: 3,500 square feets
Maid's facilities: 1 room and 1 bathroom for live in domestic
Total land extent: 81.85 perches
Furnished or unfurnished: Semi-furnished

Other notable features/amenities of the property: Well maintained garden in front and back of the house). Plenty of light entering the house during the day and close proximity to the main Negombo Road..

Expected price is mainly based on the land value which is Rs.100 Million with a small window of opportunity.

Please call 0727-827777 to arrange a private viewing and strictly no brokers/agents will be entertained. Viewings only on prior appointments. Prospectives in Australia inquire on +61-421625966
